sentence.Network_en: Grandmother feels sleeping on plank bed is more comfortable than on the spring mattress.
sentence.Network_cn: 奶奶觉得板床比“席梦思”睡着舒服.

sentence.Network_en: Her bed was crisply made, her clothes put away.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的床收拾得很整洁，衣服也收起来了。

sentence.Network_en: He got out of bed and pulled on his bathrobe.
